name: WELCOME TO NOTHING
description:
WELCOME TO NOTHING

Work against with the antagonizing friendly AI to achieve something from nothing.

I thought this LD theme of “start with nothing” described most games already, so I decided to take the theme very literally (as in you don’t even have a character to start with).

Was shooting for compo, but ended up taking it easy on Sunday. Everything was jammed by me in Unity. Original plan was to dev in LOVE2D but Unity’s joint system makes certain things so easy. Hope you enjoy!
